Currencies Models¶

class currencies.models.Currency(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Store the value of currencies compared to Euro

Parameters

  • id (AutoField) – Id

  • code (CharField) – Code. currency code

  • value (FloatField) – Value. current value compared to Eur

  • last_updated (DateField) – Last updated. Store tha last time the value got updated.

exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶

Update the currencies daily
